#labels Procedures
Increments the context reference count.

Interface to OpenCL [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/clRetainContext.html clRetainContext].

== Interface ==

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clRetainContext(context, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_context), intent(inout) :: context
  integer,          intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clRetainContext
</code>
